summary:
Connecting science and technology with societal challenges, such as the effects of sea level rise, developing a circular economy and access to fresh water, to create durable solutions.  Current focus on research excellence and business growth. 

With an PhD in Sedimentary Geology and a broad interest, I have gained about 20 years of professional work experience as a Researcher, Project- and Operations Manager, covering an extensive range of projects,and programmes servicing both the public and the private sectors.

I am currently also president of the Royal Dutch Geological Society, with the board we are focusing on the increase of membership value, by providing new services for our members and increasing awareness of the role geology has in our society.

profile_positions.description: The department is an unique group of researchers and consultants specialized on morphodynamics. We have the experience and ability to understand, explain and model complex hydro- and morphodynamic behaviour resulting from changes in the climate system or derived from human activities. The department has three teams: Coastal Hazards, Sedimentary Solutions and Next Century Coastal Systems.  These teams have expert knowledge, numerical models and data tools for providing solutions for coastal hazards on timescales from days to centuries. Topics range from, how our coast will look in 100 years? to how much flooding an area will suffer during the next extreme storm-event.
profile_positions.title: Manager Applied Morphodynamics at Deltares

profile_positions.description: It is our ambition to develop knowledge on resources in the circular economy- with a focus on responsible sourcing of raw materials (sediments and groundwater) and reduction of sedimentary waste streams (slurries and brackish groundwater) and the development of tools to analyse how projects and policies contribute towards a circular economy.
profile_positions.title: Program Director Resources in a Circular Economy

profile_positions.description: Developing Science to Business Entrepreneurship; (re) structuring and implementing market strategy for applied sciences and specialised consultancy at Deltares.
profile_positions.title: Manager Research and Entrepreneurship

profile_positions.description: Responsible for quality and continuity of the department of Applied Geology and Geophysics. At the department we work on sedimentary geology (from source to sink), near surface geophysics (offshore, near shore and onshore) and monitoring of subsurface processes (e.g. deposition, erosion and subsidence)
profile_positions.title: Head of Department Applied Geology & Geophysics

profile_positions.description: Research on coastal dynamics affected by rapid sea level change.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: Knowledge exchange between TUD and Fugro sharing expertise on sedimentary dynamics of the Caspian Sea
